title: Champ Shards in Loot Boxes unbalanced.
body: okay, why have i only been getting Champ shards in Loot Boxes. it's been like 10 boxes already. i got some skins and had a little left over for some boxes and even more champ shards. idk what's going on here. my luck wasn't this bad before. but now it doesn't feel even worth opening loot boxes anymore.
